newsitem.title: UK: Freddie Mac sets $250 mln three-year callable bond.
newsitem.headline: Freddie Mac sets $250 mln three-year callable bond.

text.p: The following callable global bond was announced by lead manager Goldman Sachs.
BORROWER FEDERAL HOME LOAN MORTGAGE CORP
TYPE STRAIGHT ISS PRICE PAR PAY DATE 12.NOV.96
FULL FEES 0.15 LISTING LUX PAY FREQ SEMI-ANN
NOTES *CALLABLE AT PAR AFTER ONE YEAR.
NEG PLG NO CRS DEFLT NO FORCE MAJ YES
GOV LAW NEW YORK HOME CTRY U.S. TAX PROVS FORM W8
